data.name: Lumiland Demo
data.detailed_description:
Lumiland is a sokoban-like 3D puzzle game. Push the crates to pave the way toward your goal and adventure through light and shadow.

  • Seamless adventure experience through over 50 levels
  • Control the two playable characters and combine their unique abilities to solve the puzzles
  • Stylized, delightful art style
  • Original sound track by 希望索任合资

This free demo contains 14 levels. Check out the full game on February 11 for more mechanics and puzzles!





As your journey progresses, you sometimes face difficult situations. Luckily, the small crystal pieces you collected along the way seem to be the answer to your prayer.

data.short_description: Free demo for Lumiland, a sokoban-like 3D puzzle game in a colorful, stylized world of light and shadow.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6 series or equivalent
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13
  • Processor: 2GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
